What's Your Chow?

Chow is the best restaurant in Lagos for Nigerian cusine. At first glance, the restaurant may seem simple and unassuming, but its flavours and service are where the real power lies. Our menu offers a large selection of wines, pasta, and its classic African and contemporary dishes. A trip to Chow makes for a relaxing experience thanks to its warm and serene atmosphere.

Our Mission

  • To be a reliable food brand that offers luxury experience at pocket friendly prices.
  • To create awareness to Nigerians and Foreigners alike, about the the beauty and richness of the African food culture and the need to develop and improve upon what we already have.

Our Vision

  • To curate experiences that linger
  • To help Nigerians understand and appreciate what this country has to offer by improving domestic tourism and Increasing the level of Cultural enlightenment.
